General.Name: Hangzhou Kaierda Welding Robot Co Ltd
General.Description: Hangzhou Kaierda Welding Robot Co.,Ltd. engages in the research, development, manufacture, and sale of industrial welding equipment and welding robots in China. The company offers ultra-low splash and servo welding products, industrial robot arms and controllers, and semi-automatic and fully manual welding equipment; and after-sales services. Its products are used in automobile and auto parts manufacturing, fitness equipment, metal furniture, and other industries. The company was founded in 2009 and is headquartered in Hangzhou, China.
